item.title: Copying Files Over a Remote Connection
item.description: SCP SCP, or Secure Copy uses SSH to copy files or directories that you select. Since scp relies on ssh, it is available on the recent builds of windows (that pack ssh by default), mac and ofcourse linux. You can even copy files over jump or intermediate connections by specifiying the -o flag, like this: # To copy myfile.txt to /my/dir directory on your remote host scp -o 'ProxyJump your.jump.host' myfile.
